column3: “I smoked one hit and it immediately glued me in place. I felt high and stoned. Mentally I was very impaired, nearly incapable of doing the most basic things like operating my phone. I just wanted to close my eyes and fall asleep, which I did. After waking up with a head ache I tried some more, and it really impaired me from doing anything useful, and it wasn’t fun because I couldn’t focus on a show or game. It’s a st...”
